article:
Mr. and Mrs. White have a son. His name is John. They love _ son very much. But there is something wrong _ the boy. He can not look after himself. His parents do not know  _ is wrong. One day they take _ to see a doctor. The doctor has a look at John carefully and find the boy can not see _ . But the doctor can do nothing to help John.
After a few years, they hear there is a very good _ in a town not far away. So they _  the boy to see him. The doctor does  a small operation on John, then John can see clearly. All of them are very happy.
